name: Pyramids of Death (Saphir Games Studio)
description:
Pyramids of Death is an adventure game, type side-scroller, taking place in the world of ancient Egypt. The player will control a young adventurer trapped in the pyramids by Anubis and must find the exit to escape.

The levels are plunged into darkness. The player, having only a torch as a unique weapon and a way to find his bearings. The main character will have to be extra careful in order to evade the traps and other pitfalls that dot the levels. The level’s complexity is increasing after each stage.

In addition to traps, the player will face numerous enemies. At each different stage, the player will face many different creatures. The player will have to get rid of these creatures with the help of his torch without being touched by them. You only need one strike to kill a creature, but if the creatures do the same to character will restart the current level.

Recommended system requirements :

  • CPU: Core i5 2.8 Ghz
  • RAM: 8 GByte RAM
  • GPU: Nvidia GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 equivalent DX11 GPU, 2 GByte VRAM
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
